{"id":787873570,"question_id":1472,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1661938232,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/787873570/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Increasing Decreasing String","memory":"43.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String sortString(String s) {\n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        int[] arr = new int[26];\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            char c = s.charAt(i);\n            arr[c-'a']++;            \n        }\n        \n        \n        while(sb.length()<s.length()){\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n                if(arr[i]>0){\n                    sb.append((char)(i+'a'));\n                    arr[i]--;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            for(int i=25; i>=0; i--){\n                if(arr[i]>0){\n                     sb.append((char)(i+'a'));\n                    arr[i]--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"increasing-decreasing-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
